roleset.name: bind with a bandage or ligature

example.name: example with instrument
example.text: [All the blood vessels]-1 are ligated *trace*-1 with black silk.

example.name: binded to example
example.text: An [Ncol-Notl fragment]-1 was ligated *trace*-1 with an Xhol/Ncol digested PCR product.
example.arg: with an Xhol/Ncol digested PCR product.

roleset.note: Roleset by Katie based on internet search, parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. Verbnet class shake-22.3-2-1.
